about_the_game:
Bad Night is an erotic story-driven platformer like the classic games of old. Right down from the hand-animated frame-by-frame pixel art characters and environments to the more modern HD illustrations, voiced character battles, original soundtrack, and interludes. A fully animated intro sequence helps
to set the stage for this orgasmic adventure that takes place over one night in southern CA during the mid-’90s.

Whether you are looking for a challenging fast-paced action platformer with tons of sexy boss battles or a cleverly crafted narrative that provides hours of alone time material to experience, you owe it to yourself to experience this once-in-a-generation game of Erika’s interdimensional alien sexcapade.

Story

The adventure starts in an old town in Southern California called Barstool during the mid-nineties when a sudden beam of pure energy solidifies into a cocoon containing Erika, an interdimensional being sent to find and eradicate the source of the devastating attacks on her planet emanating from our Earth.

Little does our heroine know of the struggles that lie ahead. She learns how susceptible the weaker humans are to her lewd and erotic behavior but for the mutations of some that have come into contact with the alien DNA known as Xeno-Chrome she would have little resistance.

As she makes her way through various regions of the dangerous urban nightscape of California she also finds help from some truly unique individuals and even falls in love.

Now with only one night to complete her task, will Erika find those individuals ultimately responsible for the threat to her world and stop their ability to make the extra-dimensional attacks on her planet? Will Greta and her agents get the best of her or perhaps she will be a salacious meal for the various carnal mutations that will not hesitate to feast on her sumptuous flesh? Only her guile speed and sensuality will give her the fighting chance she needs along with the help of her newfound comrades. You only have one night to find out the fate of our beautiful temptress. So hold on tight and jump into this sexual delight known as Bad Night.

Features

HD 1080p & full screen options
High-quality, hand-animated pixel art, and animation
8+ levels with multiple environments in each
5+ hours of gameplay
16+ bosses and 8+ allies, plus many more enemies
Animated intro sequence
Pixel- animated event scenes
Fully voiced cutscenes and battle cries from enemies
Original Soundtrack and audio
Achievements that unlock new outfits for Erika
Wardrobe
Mini Games
CG Gallery
